dwelling.name: Imp Crucible
dwelling.description: Gives imps to a visiting hero for free once per week

dwelling.name: Hall of Sins
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit gogs. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Kennels
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit hell hounds. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Demon Gate
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit demons. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Hell Hole
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit pit fiends. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several pit fiends

dwelling.name: Fire Lake
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit efreet. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several efreet

dwelling.name: Forsaken Palace
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit devils. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a few devils
